name: QEP RESOURCES, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Monitored issues relating to new EPA Standards on Greenhouse Gases; Monitored discussions involving regulations regarding Hydraulic Fracturing; Monitored discussions involving Fugitive Methane Gas Emi
Oil & Gas Issues; Crude Oil & Natural Gas Exports
Monitor regulations; Executive orders affecting Oil & Gas Industry
Public Lands Access Issues; New Source Performance Standards for Oil & Gas Development on Indian Land; Monitor legislation out of the House Natural Resources Committee, including, but not limited to,
Intangible Drilling Costs (IDC's); the President's FY 2018 Budget; Oil & Gas Issues; Administration Oil & Gas Industry Tax rulemakings, Oil & Gas related tax issues
